# React Portfolio Website - Mukesh Kumar Mahato

## Project Overview
A modern, interactive personal portfolio website built with React and Vite, showcasing professional experience, projects, skills, and education.

## Tech Stack
- React 18+ with Vite
- Modern CSS with animations
- Responsive design
- Component-based architecture

## Development Guidelines
- Use functional components with React Hooks
- Implement smooth scrolling navigation
- Add interactive UI elements and animations
- Ensure mobile responsiveness
- Follow modern React best practices

## Project Structure
- `/src/components` - Reusable React components
- `/src/App.jsx` - Main application component
- `/src/index.css` - Global styles

## Running the Project
```bash
npm install
npm run dev
```

## Features
- Hero section with introduction
- Experience timeline
- Projects showcase
- Skills display
- Education history
- Contact information
- Smooth animations and transitions
